content: **this pattern is part of the summer 2024 collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size** one size **finished measurements ** 130cm / 51 wingspan 55cm / 21½ deep at centre spine **materials ** hobbii friends cotton silk 77% cotton 23% silk 50 g 1 75 oz = 120 m 131 yds yarn a #33 2 skeins yarn b #57 2 skeins yarn c #63 2 skeins **hook ** 4 00mm / us g crochet hook **gauge** 15 double_crochet & 9 row = 10cm / 4 over crochet pattern using 4mm hook after blocking **pattern information** confetti glass is constructed from the top down the shawl begins with a magic_ring and is worked outwards to expand the wingspan row by row colors are changed on each row while crocheting over ends to avoid many tails to weave in at the end **find the pattern in more languages here **
